Action.author: lordgoodman
Action.body: Hi ~eric_mesquita , did you successfully run the operator dashboard after adding `SERVER_PUBLIC_IP` environment?

Action.author: lordgoodman
Action.body: I also met this problem on Ubuntu and it was resolved by adding such environment variable, however I have not tested it on the RHEL yet

Action.author: hightall
Action.body: ~eric_mesquita yes, the variable value notified is wrong, and because the key cloak will initial for open id client creation, if the /opt/cello/keycloak-mysql directory not exists, because you got some thing wrong at the first time, so this directory will be created, and at the second time, will not initial key cloak server, so I think you need remove /opt/cello/keycloak-mysql and relaunch again.

Action.author: eric_mesquita
Action.body: Deleting /opt/cello/keycloak-mysql and relaunching allowed me to log into the dashboard. Thanks!

Action.author: lordgoodman
Action.body: ~eric_mesquita Great! I will submit a patch to fix the mistaken information in log.
